article_title: Trump Releases Reveals 11 Possible SCOTUS Picks
article_text:
I don’t know anything about these people, but here’s a video that has a decent discussion of them. They’re conservatives, and his sister, Maryanne Trump Barry — who gives conservatives indigestion — is not among the names.

But let’s be clear, this is a campaign announcement designed to assuage conservatives. It’s a political document, in essence. There’s no reason to believe that Trump would feel bound by this list.
article_summary:
They’re conservatives, and his sister, Maryanne Trump Barry — who gives conservatives indigestion — is not among the names.
There’s no reason to believe that Trump would feel bound by this list.
I don’t know anything about these people, but here’s a video that has a decent discussion of them.
But let’s be clear, this is a campaign announcement designed to assuage conservatives.
It’s a political document, in essence.
